text: Kotero, mwaulamuliro wathu, tatumiza chivumbulutso chathu kwa iwe. Iwe siumadziwa kuti chivumbulutso chidali chiyani kapena kuti chikhulupiriro chidali chiyani. Koma Ife tachipanga icho kukhala muuni umene timatsogolera nawo akapolo athu mwachifuniro chathu. Ndithudi iwe umalangiza anthu ku njira yoyenera
